channel.title: Help [delta]
channel.description:
Ok i got a couple of questions. Q1. My server base was a pvp server what had been changed to just wildy pking, how can i make another pvp area? Ik how to do it on other deltas, but not on this pvp one?? Facepalm?
Q2. When u click on a mage spell eg. Barrage how can i make the white out line of the spell apear.

item.title: Help [delta]
item.dc:creator: @Untrimmed Untrimmed
item.description:
@Untrimmed wrote:

I will give you a link to a tutorial for the pvp area part. Here it is:http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,429738.0.html

Read full topic
